subject: Football
lead_paragraph: Brett Favre and Jason Campbell grew up 100 miles apart in rural Mississippi. The combined population of their hometowns — Kiln and Taylorsville — is less than 4,000.
snippet: Brett Favre and Jason Campbell grew up 100 miles apart in rural Mississippi. The combined population of their hometowns — Kiln and Taylorsville — is less than 4,000.
